entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning except 40 through mainland inlets and valleys late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023
